choosetutorial: Learn the basics on how to play
axepick:
Axe here!
Click to select and drag or click on the green arrows
to pick!
axeheroes:
Each player has to choose a team of
five heroes
axechooseorder: The order you place the heroes is very important
axemana:
The total mana will tell the number of
skill cards per turn
(Mana/5) and the maximum skill cards in hand
(Mana/2)
axeautodeck: When you play online, if you don't pick your team in time, random heroes will be selected for you
axeselectenemy: Click on the enemy tower card to select it
axeendturn: You have no moves left! Click End Turn button.
axeselectplayer: Click to select one of your heroes now
axemove: Drag or click on the green arrows to move all your 5 heroes.
axewait: After moving, atacking or casting, your heroes need to wait for the next turn
axedone:
Your turn is over, wait for end of the
enemy turn
axetime: You need to pay attention to time. Each turn takes an hour and the sky changes every 12 turns
axeenemymove:
Your enemy is moving...
get ready to battle!
axeattack: Select one of your heroes close to the enemy and click on the red arrow to attack
axeskillselect: Your skill cards are picked at the beginning of yout turn. Click to select a passive skill
axeskill: Drag or click on a blue arrow to use a skill card. Passive skills do not end the hero turn
axetoggle: Toggle skills stay in your left hand and also won't end the hero turn
axecast: Drag or click on a blue arrow to cast a skill. Active skills will prevent any other action until next turn
axeend: Ah! Your did it, now you are ready for a real battle
chooselibrary: Learn every detail of all cards in the game
choosecampain: Coming soon - Play against the computer
librarytesttitle: Test a hero and his skills
noenemy: Sorry but we could not find an opponent
pickdeck: Pick your deck, game starts in
towerDescription: Attacks the lowest HP enemy unit in range every turn
reload: Connection to the server was lost. Reload?
